params.owner: Owner of the contract, can register/ unregister roots

initialize(address).details: Initializes the contract, to be called by the proxy delegating calls to this implementation

params.owner: Owner of the contract, can update public key and address

isRootAvailableForAttester(address,uint2.details: Initializes the contract, to be called by the proxy delegating calls to this implementation

params.attester: Owner of the contract, can update public key and address
params.root: Owner of the contract, can update public key and address

isRootAvailableForMe(uint256).details: returns whether a root is available for a caller (msg.sender)

params.root: root to check whether it is registered for me or not

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerRootForAll(uint256).details: Registers a root, available for all contracts

registerRootForAttester(address,uint256).details: Register a root available for an attester

params.attester: Attester which will have the root available

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unregisterRootForAll(uint256).details: Unregister a root, available for all contracts

unregisterRootForAttester(address,uint25.details: Unregister a root for an attester

params.attester: Attester which will no longer have the root available

userdoc.notice: This contract stores that data required by attesters to be available so they can verify user claims This contract is deployed behind a proxy and this implementation is focused on storing merkle roots For more information: https://available-roots-registry.docs.sismo.io*
